content:
President Rodrigo Duterte has chosen Insurance Commissioner Emmanuel Dooc as the new president and chief executive officer (CEO) of the Social Security System (SSS).

Duterte approved the nomination of Dooc as replacement for Emilio de Quiros, according to a letter signed by Executive Secretary Salvador Medialdea.

Aside from being a commissioner at the Insurance Commission, Dooc is also a member of the Anti-Money Laundering Council (AMLC).

title: Duterte OKs Emmanuel Dooc as CEO of SSS
